thread.title: Paul Mathsen
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Paul Mathsen

author: Paul Mathsen
title: Paul Mathsen
text: I purchased a Pelican water softener and an under counter reverse osmosis system. The purchasing process was very pleasant and the customer service was excellent. I had a local plumber install they system and they were very impressed with the products. I would recommend these products to anyone looking for a water softener and RO system. The drinking water tastes great and the water in nice and soft. Great product.
